title: High ping

embed.description: Test your mobile network speed, wherever you may be. Download the free Ookla Speedtest app for iOS, Amazon, Android or Windows Phone.

body:
I've seen a lot of threads on the Help and support board about people having high ping and ive gone through most of them and tried all those solutions but it hasnt fixed anything. I was wondering if riot's servers are messed up right now or what? 
I had about 200ms for the past few months and there was no lag but now the ping goes upto 700 and it lags a lot.
I've checked already it has nothing to do with my net connection because my speed it still 35mbps

replies.body:
I wasn't able to discover any issues with our game servers, but I'm happy to help troubleshoot!  It does sound like your network might be having some problems reaching our game server which could be caused for a few reasons, or how your ISP is routing to us.  I'm not sure what steps you've gone through so let's get a traceroute to see where your connection is going.  Grab WinMTR and run a traceroute to:  104.160.131.1

Give it a few minutes, then let me know what you find.
